title: Gold 2 Adc/Sup main Looking for serious  LCS style Team!!! OP.gg linked

embed.description: Real-time LoL Stats! Check your Summoner, Live Spectate and using powerful global League of Legends Statistics!

body:
Im free almost all the time. Looking for a serious team to get better and compete with. I play with ADC and Support pretty evenly so I can try out for either. Add me in game or on discord if interested..
IGN - Mr Otter
Discord - MoistPotato#2451

replies.body: Hey bud, My name is Bearr and i run a division of players under the name Infius Gaming, were a community of players that play everything from Fortnite to League and we're looking to recruit for our competitive teams. We practice two days a week minimum and we host tourneys and we even look for them when we can in our brackets if you're interested at all add me on Discord @ Bearrr#1867
